data.lyric:
[ti:Deep Pockets (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Dark Lane Demo Tapes (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Deep Pockets (Explicit) - Drake
[00:00.09]Lyrics by：Aubrey Graham/N. Shebib/P. Reynolds
[00:00.19]Composed by：Aubrey Graham/N. Shebib/P. Reynolds
[00:00.29]Godd**n
[00:07.84]For my n***a Hush
[00:09.97]Yeah look
[00:13.44]Dressed in fatigues I rep the East with my trustees
[00:16.39]Smokin' on crushed leaves
[00:17.90]They turn they back on everything we built then they must bleed
[00:21.20]I've seen splatter hit the snow when the blood freeze
[00:24.30]Straps over territory they know we must keep
[00:27.31]Get home and white Air Forces get brushed clean
[00:30.18]Back when my mama would interrupt sleep
[00:32.42]To tell me hurry up 'cause the bus leaves
[00:34.95]Summertime heat waves I used to just cut sleeves
[00:37.97]My shortie really love me man she want me to cut keys
[00:41.05]I can't do that normal type of life is it just me
[00:44.27]N***as steady try to ride the wave but it's rough seas
[00:47.10]I'm losin' enough sleep dealin' with envy
[00:49.86]And the news that they sent for me got the block in a frenzy
[00:52.68]It's on Meeks like it's trendy
[00:54.69]Runnin' round from Laurie to MacKenzie when the city's empty
[00:58.11]Yeah early twenties but I want fifties hunnids not pennies
[01:02.78]I need plenty got me ready to flip the F out like Fendi
[01:07.14]Whatever's in me it's takin' over
[01:09.74]I gotta bust it down and break it open
[01:12.12]Until somebody starts takin' notice then we rollin'
[01:15.25]Yeah then we rollin' then we rollin'
[01:19.26]Deep pockets on a n***a I can't find my phone in
[01:21.96]Now we rollin' yeah
[01:26.87]Then we rollin' then we rollin'
[01:30.01]Deep pockets on a n***a I can't find my phone in
[01:32.74]Now we rollin'
[01:34.72]Yeah look
[01:39.01]Back when Big Apple sold dreams I stuck to my own thing
[01:42.65]Back when the house that I own now was my home screen
[01:45.58]Before I'd ever hit the road and feel like the home team
[01:48.62]Runnin' missions pyramid scheme just like the Egyptians
[01:52.17]Back when hotlines were still flippin'
[01:55.16]Now I'm seein' money off of hotlines blingin' but it feels different
[01:59.49]Transitions plans switchin' ambition
[02:04.13]Mindin' my business buildin' a business etcetera
[02:07.07]Inspired by a few but my mind really drives itself like Tesla
[02:11.46]Always had a little somethin' extra
[02:13.87]Back when Corey was our sole investor
[02:16.34]And the car could get from A to B but won't impress ya
[02:19.08]Look I ain't no baller
[02:20.65]Still need my accounts longer like the way my nephew's gettin' taller
[02:24.44]My soundtrack is the second Carter dreamin' of acceptin' offers
[02:28.66]And easin' tensions
[02:30.12]Keepin' family out of East Detention and out of Pine Hill Funeral Center
[02:34.05]Spots we got no business enterin'
[02:36.21]Back when Jill Scott was the apple of my afrocentric eye
[02:39.20]I had to find a way to get someone's attention
[02:41.94]Then we rollin' then we rollin'
[02:45.42]Deep pockets on a n***a I can't find my phone in
[02:48.12]Now we rollin' yeah
[02:52.76]Then we rollin' then we rollin'
[02:55.98]Deep pockets on a n***a I can't find my phone in
[02:58.89]Now we rollin'
data.trans:
[ti:Deep Pockets (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Dark Lane Demo Tapes (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.09]//
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.29]老天啊
[00:07.84]为了我的兄弟 Hush
[00:09.97]给我听好了
[00:13.44]我穿上迷彩服 蓄势待发 我和我的团队成为家乡的骄傲
[00:16.39]尽情地吞云吐雾
[00:17.90]他们对我们亲手创造的一切不屑一顾 他们一定会付出惨痛的代价
[00:21.20]我亲眼见过鲜血洒在雪地里 凝结成冰
[00:24.30]他们知道我们一定会誓死守护地盘
[00:27.31]我回到家 把白色运动鞋清洗干净
[00:30.18]想起以前妈妈会叫醒熟睡中的我
[00:32.42]催促我抓紧时间 因为公共汽车要开走了
[00:34.95]炎炎夏日 热浪来袭 我以前常把衣袖剪短
[00:37.97]我的妹子深爱着我 她想名正言顺地陪在我身边
[00:41.05]我不能过着平庸的生活 这还是我吗
[00:44.27]大家步步为营 试图乘风破浪 可这片海波涛汹涌
[00:47.10]我难以安睡 辗转反侧 与嫉妒抗衡
[00:49.86]他们给我送来的消息让整个街区陷入疯狂
[00:52.68]这依靠Meeks 仿佛这是潮流
[00:54.69]城里空荡荡的时候 从Laurie到MacKenzie 一路奔波
[00:58.11]我早在二十岁出头的时候大赚一笔 可我还想挣更多的钱
[01:02.78]我需要更多的钱 买下全套芬迪
[01:07.14]我从头到脚全穿着名牌
[01:09.74]我纵享欢乐 忘乎所以
[01:12.12]直到有人开始注意到我们 我们尽情放纵
[01:15.25]我们尽情放纵 我们尽情放纵
[01:19.26]我的口袋太深了 以至于我找不到手机
[01:21.96]如今我们尽情放纵
[01:26.87]我们尽情放纵 我们尽情放纵
[01:30.01]我的口袋太深了 以至于我找不到手机
[01:32.74]如今我们尽情放纵
[01:34.72]听着
[01:39.01]回想起繁华的纽约城贩卖梦想 我不为所动 坚持做自己的事
[01:42.65]回想起我现在住的豪宅 以前只是我电脑屏幕上的壁纸
[01:45.58]在我踏上征程以前 我觉得我依然拥有主场优势
[01:48.62]埋头苦干 进行非法诈骗 我就像埃及人一样
[01:52.17]回首往事 那时热线电话风靡一时
[01:55.16]如今我的大热单曲帮我赚了很多钱 这感觉截然不同
[01:59.49]自我调整 改变计划 充满雄心壮志
[02:04.13]一心扑在我的事业上 拓展业务 还很多事等着我去做
[02:07.07]我受到一些启发 可我随心而动 就像自动驾驶的特斯拉一样
[02:11.46]我总是有一些别的想法
[02:13.87]想当初Corey我们唯一的投资人
[02:16.34]这车子可以让你安全地抵达目的地 可这根本不会引起你的注意
[02:19.08]听着 我不会投机取巧
[02:20.65]我依然渴望我账户的钞票越多越好 就像我的侄子一样越长越高
[02:24.44]我的歌让我成为第二个Carter 我梦想着收到合作邀请
[02:28.66]缓解紧张的氛围
[02:30.12]让我的家人免受牢狱之灾 躲过血光之灾
[02:34.05]我们不会去做非法交易
[02:36.21]回首往事 那时Jill Scott是我心中挚爱
[02:39.20]我必须想个办法引起别人的注意
[02:41.94]我们尽情放纵 我们尽情放纵
[02:45.42]我的口袋太深了 以至于我找不到手机
[02:48.12]如今我们尽情放纵
[02:52.76]我们尽情放纵 我们尽情放纵
[02:55.98]我的口袋太深了 以至于我找不到手机
[02:58.89]如今我们尽情放纵
